DOC.brief_summary: Effect of nicotine patch as an adjutant for acute pain after surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Nicotine Patch as an Analgesic Adjuvant After Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: This is a dose finding trial for nicotine patches as analgesics. Doses used are 5mg/ 10mg/ 15mg or placebo. Primary outcome variable is reported pain score (VAS), secondary is morphine PCA utilization, nausea, sedation, and hemodynamic changes.
DOC.criteria: Adult ASA 12 Cardiovascular disease Former smoker Pregnant Nursing Asthma
